items.sentence: As the train went by, Tom caught a glimpse of the driver.
Tom only ate about a third of what Mary put on his plate.
Tom doesn't think Mary was the one who stole his bicycle.
I've been to Australia twice and New Zealand three times.
According to the newspapers, it's going to snow tomorrow.
Our original plan was to do things the way Tom suggested.
Tom not only ate his dessert, he also ate Mary's as well.
This is the first time I've eaten this kind of ice cream.
There are some things that shouldn't be done by the book.
The woman over there talking to Tom is my French teacher.
